page.title: 11My Paper Round
page.content:
Every week I deliver Forest Reviews which is a free newspaper with lots of adverts in it. There are one hundred and thirty two papers to deliver. I do one hundred on the Wednesday and the thirty two on the Thursday. I deliver to five streets Abbey St, Pembroke St, Commercial St, Victoria St and Prospect Road. I some times have leaflets to deliver and it takes a long time. Last time I delivered leaflets I dropped them all over the road. I get a penny for each paper and for each leaflet usually my friend helps me and I buy her some sweets or something else.
{by Gary Dickinson
